General.Name: i-Components Co. Ltd
General.Description: i-Components Co., Ltd produces and sells barrier and optical plastic films, and substrates in South Korea. Its products are used for manufacturing of general-purpose plastics, such as polystyrene, PMMA, PC, and PES, as well as display, automobile, home appliance, mobile phone, and sports applications. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Pyeongtaek-si, South Korea.
General.Address: Chupal Industrial Complex, Pyeongtaek-Si, South Korea
